name: Best Benalmadena Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Comfortable, clean room in lovely quiet location overlooking the sea. Food very good, which is very important when All Inclusive - wide selection and you can usually always find something you'd like to eat. Entertainment OK (if you like cabaret), some early evening entertainment for the kids. Only downside is the bar service - very short staffed and sometimes large queues form, and empty glasses/cups left on tables for a long time. Great choice if you want a quiet holiday in a nice location. Likewise service in the restaurant can be slow due to short staffing, ie. getting drinks/having plates cleared away.
reviews.title: Great 4 Star Hotel

reviews.text: Wide variety of nationalities and a lot of Spanish visit, especially at the weekend.
reviews.title: A Cheap Break

reviews.text: We booked this for a late bit of sunshine and thats what we got for 4 days........
reviews.title: Everything fine, except the weather!

likes.liked: — Other guests, food all round good aura

description: Located directly at Benalmádena Coast, facing the sea and just a few minutes walk from the golf courses around the area. Comfortable rooms with sea view balconies, fully fitted bathroom with hairdryer, satellite TV, security door lock, fridge, heating, air conditioning, internet and optional safe-deposit box. Buffet restaurant with show cooking, national and international cuisine. Swimming pool for adults and children, outdoor jacuzzi, garden and gym. Day and night entertainment program. Optional services: Parking, Spa, massages,hairdresser’s beauty salon, gift shop and meeting room.
